name: Butterflies (toaddoesnot, Raisaur)
description:
This is our little game inspired by the song "Butterflies" by Fiji Blue! Rules:

1. Move your character left and right with AD or arrow keys.
2. Move your character's line of sight with mouse.
3. Avoid seagulls at all cost!

When you catch your special one with the sight, you fill up with butterflies. The goal is reached when you get a full butterfly meter.
